dict.string: Camera access is required to capture images for tissue monitoring.
Used to authenticate authorized clinicians for access to patient data.
Used for audio cues or to synchronize capture timing.
Used to measure device orientation and ensure accurate optical geometry.
Used to save captured images and analysis results to your device.
Used to select reference images for calibration or analysis.
Used to capture 3D depth data (LiDAR) for tissue geometry correction and oxygenation mapping.
